About Me

Bio

I’m a Full-Stack Software Engineer with many years of industry experience and a degree in Computer Graphics Technology from IUPUI. I specialize in building scalable, user-focused applications — blending backend efficiency with design intuition. My leadership language is cooperation: I love bringing people together to work, whether that’s unblocking a teammate, mentoring newer devs, or brainstorming the next big feature.

Gannett Imaging and Ad Design Center

Digital Media Designer

Worked in a production environment creating digital ads in Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Acrobat, but primarily Adobe Flash. Worked on creating/editing provided assets, ActionScript development, and occasionally writing and editing of copy.

Daily tools: Photoshop, Illustrator, Flash, ActionScript, Microsoft Word, Acrobat

Gannett Imaging and Ad Design Center

Developer

Wrote and implemented RESTful API backends for productivity, reporting, and image manipulation in Laravel.

Daily tools: Git, JIRA, Laravel, Unix, MySQL

Hack Reactor

Full Stack Software Engineering Student

Hack Reactor is the premier immersive software developer program focused on training full-stack software engineers and making experts in Javascript. Each student works over 70+ hours a week for 13 weeks through a variety of computer science concepts and work on projects of interest to continue development and build their portfolio. For more information about Hack Reactor's curriculum go to: http://www.hackreactor.com/curriculum

Trendy Minds, Inc

Developer

100% remote full-stack Web Developer working with Craft CMS, Wordpress, PHP, React, JavaScript, CSS, and AWS Lambda for the largest Marketing, Advertising, Public Relations firm in Indianapolis, Indiana. Daily responsible for general support and maintenance of client marketing sites for small clients to Fortune 500. Engineered an overlay application that reduced bug reporting workflow by 75%. Worked on legacy codebases in order to make modifications and improvements, namely bringing Google Lighthouse performance scores into the 90+ range.

Daily Tools: Git, Harvest, VSCode, Buddy, Sketch, Google Workspace Suite, PHP, React, JavaScript, AWS, Twig, CSS (BEM and Tailwind), Figma

Climb Credit

Software Engineer

Working on a small, Agile team integrating sophisticated third party vendor endpoints to work with a legacy code base written in Vanilla JS and AngularJS with a strong eye to regulatory and legal compliance. Responsible for documenting codebase modules without previous documentation in Atlassian Confluence. Innovated a “code-jam” to get the team together weekly in a low-pressure meeting to share knowledge, techniques, and “a-ha”s discovered in our current tickets.

Daily Tools: React, AngularJS, Vanilla JS, TypeScript, MongoDB, Travis CI/CD, Github, AWS, Atlassian JIRA & Confluence
